name: Barbara Gordon <> Oracle - Bird of Prey
text: Activate >>> Draw a card. Activate >>> Oracle gets +3 ATK this attack.

name: Batcomputer
text: Activate >>> Target Gotham Knights character you control gets +1 ATK and has flight and range this turn.

name: Batman - Vengeance
text: Whenever Batman or another Gotham Knights character you control becomes stunned, each of your opponents loses 1 endurance.

name: Batman - Shadow of the Bat
text: While you have seven or more cards in hand, whenever Batman stuns a character, that character's controller loses endurance equal to that character's cost. (This is in addition to the normal stun endurance loss.)

name: Bronze Tiger - Brainwashed Assassin
text: Activate >>> Target League of Assassins character you control gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF this attack.

name: Cassandra Cain <> Batgirl - Student of the Knight
text: Whenever Cassandra Cain stuns a character, that character's controller loses 2 endurance. (This is in addition to the normal stun endurance loss.)

name: Catwoman - Cat Burglar
text: Whenever Catwoman causes breakthrough, draw a card.

name: Commissioner Gordon - Lieutenant Gordon
text: When Commissioner Gordon comes into play, you may search your deck for a character card named Batman and reveal it. If you searched, shuffle your deck, then put that card on the top of your deck.

name: Dick Grayson <> Nightwing - Defender of Blüdhaven
text: Whenever Dick Grayson stuns a character, draw a card.|Discard a Gotham Knights character card from your hand >>> Target defender has reinforcement this attack.

name: Fear Skull
text: As an additional cost to play Fear Skull, exhaust a character you control.|If target opponent has more endurance than you, that opponent loses 4 endurance. Otherwise, that opponent loses 2 endurance.

name: Flying Fortress
text: Activate >>> Target League of Assassins character has flight this turn. That character gets +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

name: Gotham City
text: Activate, Exhaust a Gotham Knights character you control >>> Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Gotham Knights character card with cost 3 or greater, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Hook - Hired Killer
text: At the start of the recovery phase, you may KO target stunned character with cost 3 or less.

name: Huntress - Bird of Prey
text: Huntress gets +3 ATK while attacking.

name: Kyle Abbot - Demon's Hound
text: Kyle Abbot gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF while you have the initiative.

name: Lady Shiva - The Destroyer
text: Whenever Lady Shiva attacks a character, that character loses reinforcement and cannot gain reinforcement this attack.

name: Merlyn - Archer Assassin
text: Activate >>> Target player loses 5 endurance.

name: Ra's al Ghul - Eternal Nemesis
text: Whenever Ra's al Ghul causes breakthrough while attacking a character, KO that character.

name: Ra's al Ghul - Undying
text: Whenever Ra's al Ghul becomes stunned, you may return him to his owner's hand. If you do, gain 7 endurance.

name: Shadow of the Bat
text: Target character you control gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF this attack.

name: Spoiler - Wildcard
text: When Spoiler comes into play, draw a card.

name: Swing Line
text: Target character you control has flight and range this turn. That character gets +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

name: Talia - Beloved Daughter
text: When Talia comes into play, you may search your deck for a character card named Ra's al Ghul and reveal it. If you searched, shuffle your deck, then put that card on the top of your deck.

name: Tim Drake <> Robin - Protégé
text: Activate >>> Target Gotham Knights character you control gets +3 ATK this attack.

name: Trial by Sword
text: Target character you control gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF this turn while attacking a character with greater cost or while defending against a character with greater cost.

name: Ubu - One of Many
text: Ubu gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF while protecting a League of Assassins character. If that character is named Ra's al Ghul, Ubu gets an additional +1 ATK and +1 DEF. (Stunned characters are not protected.)

name: Ubu Encampment
text: Activate, Exhaust a League of Assassins character you control >>> Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a League of Assassins character card with cost 3 or greater, put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Whisper A'Daire - Serpent-Tongued Seductress
text: Whisper A'Daire gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF while you control a character named Kyle Abbot.
